member.name: M:Text.Str.IsPalindrome(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether a string is a palindrome.
member.returns: True if the string is a palindrome; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Text.Str.CleanString(System.String)
member.summary: Helper function to clean the input string by removing spaces and punctuation and converting to lowercase.
member.param: The input string to be cleaned.
